title: Megan Thee Stallion: US jury finds Tory Lanez guilty of shooting hip-hop star
description: The Canadian rapper faces more than 20 years in jail for wounding the Grammy-winning hip-hop star in 2020.

title: Snowman composer reversions classic with TikTok violinist
description: Esther Abrami has worked with The Snowman composer Howard Blake on a new arrangement.

title: In pictures: Scotland's amazing Christmas trees
description: From royal palaces to glamorous restaurants to trees that aren't really trees.

title: Notorious past of one of Scotland's most expensive streets
description: Danube Street in Edinburgh was once home to Scotland's most famous brothel.

title: White Christmas forecast for parts of Scotland
description: A Met Office yellow alert for snow and ice has been put in place for Christmas Day and Boxing Day.

title: Kalvin Phillips: Pep Guardiola says Man City midfielder was 'overweight' after World Cup
description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Kalvin Phillips was "overweight" when he returned to training from the World Cup.

title: Rishi Sunak thanks public servants with surprise Christmas calls
description: Rishi Sunak phones diplomats, Royal Navy crew and other workers to thank them for their efforts.

title: Train strikes: Passengers brace for Christmas Eve disruption
description: Trains will stop running at around 15:00 on Saturday, as walkouts on the railways and other industries continue.

title: Premiership Rugby: London Irish 29-20 Saracens
description: London Irish survive a spell with just 12 men to hand Saracens their first Premiership defeat of the campaign.

title: King's Christmas message to pay tribute to Queen's legacy
description: Charles is set to include a tribute to his late mother in his first Christmas Day address.

title: Ross County 0-1 Rangers: Michael Beale retains 100% start thanks to John Lundstram winner
description: Rangers narrow the gap to Celtic to six points with a slender Scottish Premiership win over Ross County - a third in a row under Michael Beale.

title: Boiling water turns to snow in freezing US state
description: Even boiling water is freezing as dangerously cold temperatures sweep large parts of the US.

title: The Sun apologises over Jeremy Clarkson's Meghan column
description: The newspaper says it regrets publishing the piece, in which Clarkson said he "hated" the duchess.

title: Santa-filled armoured truck gets stuck in Cornwall lane
description: The Santas, who were thought to be on a pub crawl, got wedged in a hedge in Cornwall.

title: Emiliano Martinez celebrations: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery to speak to goalkeeper
description: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery plans to speak to goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez about his celebrations following Argentina's World Cup win.

title: Scientists find secret to how glass frogs turn transparent
description: Scientists discover the glass frog's "superpower" in its ability to pool blood to turn see-through.

title: LadBaby: Food Aid is the UK's Christmas number one
description: The charity campaigners now have more Christmas number ones than any other act in chart history.

title: Premier League returns: Every Angle of Pajtim Kasami's 'exceptional' 2013 goal for Fulham
description: To celebrate the Premier League's return, here is one of the competition's greatest goals, by Fulham's Pajtim Kasami's, from 2013.

title: Food bank delivers Christmas spirit in Oxfordshire with 'Big Lunch'
description: A community group welcomes 150 people to a festive meal in Oxfordshire to fight loneliness and isolation.

title: Woman dies in Oldham after being hit by police car
description: The woman was hit by a police car which had been in pursuit of a suspected stolen vehicle, officers say.

title: World Snooker Tour: Chen Zifan becomes eighth Chinese player to be suspended
description: Chen Zifan is the eighth Chinese player to be suspended from the World Snooker Tour.

title: Lakeside Miller & Carter floating restaurant starts to sink

title: £20 daily bonus for troops covering Christmas strikes

title: Zara Aleena: Family members 'completely destroyed' by murder

title: Donations for late Queen given to fuel bill charity
description: Money donated in memory of Queen Elizabeth is being used to help those unable to pay energy bills.

title: The Christmas questions you've been searching for

title: Kyra King: Mother admits losing control of dog that killed baby

title: Ana de Armas fans told they can sue over Yesterday trailer

description: NHS nurses to strike again on 18 and 19 January in England unless pay talks are opened, Royal College of Nursing says

description: The Massachusetts man's head-scratching strategy nets him nearly $2m, plus 20 annual payments of $25,000.
